alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 16 at 8:51PM EST until January 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST MONDAY... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 8 to 12 feet expected in the surf zone. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas in North Topsail Beach, along the lower New River, White Oak River, Bogue and Core Sounds, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, until 11 AM EST Monday. For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 7 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/07 PM 6.0 0.2 3.9 2 Moderate 17/08 AM 3.2 -2.6 0.1 1-2 None 17/08 PM 2.1 -3.7 0.0 1 None 18/08 AM 3.2 -2.6 0.0 1 None 18/09 PM 2.3 -3.5 0.1 1 None 19/09 AM 3.2 -2.6 0.1 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
